pausePlayer.name: PlayerPause
pausePlayer.name[zh_CN]: 插拔声音设备暂停输出

autoSwitchPort.name: AutoSwitchPort
autoSwitchPort.name[zh_CN]: 根据dde优先级管理自动切换端口

bluezModeFilterList.name[zh_CN]: 需要过滤的蓝牙音频模式
bluezModeFilterList.description: bluetooth audio mode that requires filtering

reduceNoise.name: reduceNoiseEnable
reduceNoise.description: default reduce noise status. Notice: the machines of huawei hisikirin do not support reduce noise, please do not enable this item
reduceNoise.description[zh_CN]: 噪音抑制开关，注意：华为海思麒麟的机器不支持噪音抑制，请不要开启

inputDefaultPrioritiesByType.name: InputPrioritiesByType
inputDefaultPrioritiesByType.name[zh_CN]: 通过端口类型设置输入优先级
inputDefaultPrioritiesByType.description: input priorities set by port type, 0:bluetooth 1:headest, 2:usb, 3:buildin, 4:hdmi, 5:lineI/O, 6:multi-channel, 7:unknown
inputDefaultPrioritiesByType.description[zh_CN]: 通过端口类型设置输入优先级,0:蓝牙音频 1:3.5mm, 耳麦 2:USB, 3:内置扬声器和话筒, 4:HDMI, 5:线缆输入输出, 6:多声道, 7:其他类型

outputDefaultPrioritiesByType.name: OutputPrioritiesByType
outputDefaultPrioritiesByType.name[zh_CN]: 通过端口类型设置输出优先级
outputDefaultPrioritiesByType.description: output priorities set by port type, 0:bluetooth 1:headest, 2:usb, 3:buildin, 4:hdmi, 5:lineI/O, 6:multi-channel, 7:unknown
outputDefaultPrioritiesByType.description[zh_CN]: 通过端口类型设置输出优先级,0:蓝牙音频 1:3.5mm, 耳麦 2:USB, 3:内置扬声器和话筒, 4:HDMI, 5:线缆输入输出, 6:多声道, 7:其他类型
